addCandidateDescription: Search for a candidate by name to add them to this vacancy funnel.
rejectDescription: You are about to reject candidate {{name}}. They will be moved to "Rejected" column.
offerSimpleDescription: Candidate {{name}} will be moved to "Ready for offer" status
offerSimpleInfoDescription: After confirmation, discuss work conditions with the candidate via chat. You can propose salary, conditions and other details personally.
offerStatusUpdated: Discuss conditions with candidate in chat
offerCannotMoveRejected: Cannot move rejected candidate to offer
offerConsiderReminderDesc: We recommend discussing this candidate with the team before sending an offer
moveBackDescription: Return candidate to previous stage for reassessment
reopenHiredDescription: Reopen hiring process for hired candidate
impossibleTransitionDesc: This transition doesn't make sense. Please choose another status.

actions.considerHint: Candidate requires team discussion. Conduct another interview or discuss with colleagues before making decision.

compareHistoryDescription: All past AI comparisons of candidates for this vacancy
